dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Vidthayanon, C. 2013. Danio erythromicron. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description: The species is endemic to Inlé Lake, Shan State, Myanmar. The extent of occurrence (EOO) is ca. 116 km², although the net open area of the lake has declined in recent decades from 69.1 km² to 46.7 km² (Sidle et al. 2007), and the area of occupancy is therefore estimated to be 46.7 km².
